entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this afternoon then mainly cloudy. Wind southeast 20 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill near minus 31. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 08:41 AM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Light snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 19.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning overnight. Blowing snow overnight. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 19. Wind chill near minus 33. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 08:41 AM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 16. POP 40%
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 35 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 08:41 AM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023
